img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 47.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/04/Wukong_LowerHollow_47.jpg)
Once you've dealt enough damage to clear his health bar, Zhu Bajie will flee the Hut of Immortality. The battle isn't exactly over, but you will get some experience and will for surviving the encounter.
img_below_text:
There actually isn't anything more you can do in the Hut of Immortality, as all the doors are sealed. However, when you return to the Shrine outside, you'll find a new cave path has been carved out that leads outside to a large muddy hole.
Your battle with Zhu Bajie isn't over. In fact -- it's about to get a whole lot harder.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong LowerHollow 47.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/04/Wukong_LowerHollow_47.jpg)
Once you've dealt enough damage to clear his health bar, Zhu Bajie will flee the Hut of Immortality. The battle isn't exactly over, but you will get some experience and will for surviving the encounter."
        - Following Text: "There actually isn't anything more you can do in the Hut of Immortality, as all the doors are sealed. However, when you return to the Shrine outside, you'll find a new cave path has been carved out that leads outside to a large muddy hole.
Your battle with Zhu Bajie isn't over. In fact -- it's about to get a whole lot harder."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts the player character, Wukong, standing in a dark cave environment with stalactites and rock formations. A red arrow indicates a path forward, suggesting progression to a new area. This scene follows the encounter with Zhu Bajie in the Hut of Immortality and leads to a cave path outside, setting up the next phase of the battle in a large muddy hole. The HUD displays health, abilities, and controls, emphasizing preparation for the upcoming challenge.
